courses.name: Web Development
courses.description: Introduction to Web Development using JavaScript, Extensive coverage of NodeJS, Project-Based Learning Approach, Lessons on Deploying your Application, Basics & Advanced Topics for Interviews

flashcards.back: As a part of these online Web Development classes, the students will start off with the fundamentals of building basic websites and will go on to create more functional and complex portals. The course will start with topics such as HTML, CSS, and JS and then move on to important concepts such as version control, databases, Node.Js and advanced topics such as security.

reviews.title: Awesome Course
reviews.description: This course helped me land my first job.

reviews.title: Well versed course
reviews.description: This course helped me upgrade my job.

courses.name: Machine Learning
courses.description: The course is broadly divided in 7 categories, and covers many topics from Coding Blocks Data Science & Deep Learning Course., Introduction to Machine Learning, Supervised Learning Algorithms, Unsupervised Learning, Deep Learning, Deep Learning in Computer Vision, Deep Learning Natural Language Processing, Reinforcement Learning

flashcards.back: The Machine Learning online course starts with the essentials of Python, gradually moving towards to concepts of advanced algorithms and finally into the cores of Machine Learning. With our key focus being the live projects, we dive deeper into the fundamentals of classical algorithms and deep neural networks enabling the students to work out optimising solutions to the real-world problems. It is just a matter of weeks before the students actually begin building intelligent systems, working on AI algorithms and data crunching.

courses.name: UPSC Preparation
courses.description: UPSC Preparation course has been purposely designed to help students prepare through a step-up approach. It is also a meticulously designed IAS Study Plan to clear UPSC exam by keeping one on track towards covering the UPSC syllabus extensively from NCERT to ADVANCE level.

segments.title: History
segments.description: History is included in the General Studies Paper I in the UPSC Main and General Studies Paper in UPSC CSE Prelims. Our course provides an extensive in depth coverage of history to help you score full in this section.

flashcards.back: History is included in the General Studies Paper I in the UPSC Main and General Studies Paper in UPSC CSE Prelims. About 17-22% of questions in Prelims are asked from History. Questions on important landmarks can be asked in the interview, as well. Further, history is one of the extremely vast subjects when it comes to the syllabus. Hence, the history syllabus for UPSC must be strategically covered so as to ensure you reap maximum benefits from your preparation.

courses.name: Javascript
courses.description: JavaScript is the world's most popular programming language. JavaScript is the programming language of the Web. JavaScript is easy to learn.

segments.title: Javascript
segments.description: JavaScript is high-level, often just-in-time compiled, and multi-paradigm. It has curly-brack.et syntax, dynamic typing, prototype-based object-orientation, and first-class functions. This course will help you learn it.

flashcards.back: JavaScript is high-level, often just-in-time compiled, and multi-paradigm.
